techStack: Single-file vanilla HTML/CSS/JS browser app with embedded WebRTC, Web Audio API, and Notification API

files.purpose: Self-contained single-file application with embedded CSS, JavaScript, and all UI components for peer-to-peer baby monitoring
User documentation covering setup, connection establishment, mode switching, cry detection testing, and troubleshooting

constraints: Single HTML file must be under 5MB with all assets embedded inline
WebRTC connection limited to same local network without STUN/TURN servers
Manual SDP offer/answer exchange via copy-paste required for peer connection
Cry detection algorithm tuned with publicly available baby crying audio samples
Browser notifications only work when tab backgrounded but browser remains open
Primary development and testing on Chrome 80+, documented compatibility with Firefox 75+/Safari 14+/Edge 80+
No external dependencies or CDN links - fully offline functional after initial load
High sensitivity cry detection prioritized over precision, accepting higher false positive rate
1-day prototype timeline limits production-grade error handling and edge case coverage
Connection failure due to NAT/firewall displays clear error with local network workaround instructions
